channel.title: U.S.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2016 The New York Times Company

item.title: Why a Pot Farmer Opposes Legal Marijuana
item.description: A ballot initiative on Tuesday may be a turning point for marijuana growers in California. Visit a pot farm where the owner is against legalization for recreational use.
item.author: By HILARY SWIFT, NIKO KOPPEL and SAMANTHA QUICK

item.title: The Biggest Turning Points in a Polarizing Campaign
item.description: The race between Donald J. Trump and Hillary Clinton has been one of the most contentious in modern American history. Here’s a look at how we covered major developments.
item.author: By LIAM STACK

item.title: Presidential Election: Clinton Tries to Run Up a Lead as Trump Seeks a Breakthrough
item.description: Donald J. Trump heads to the blue state of Minnesota in hopes of assembling an Electoral College win. Hillary Clinton’s top surrogate, President Obama, heads to Florida in a final push for early votes.
item.author: By ALEXANDER BURNS

item.title: South Carolina Man May Be Linked to 7 Killings, Authorities Say
item.description: A man charged in the kidnapping of a woman found alive confessed to the unsolved killings of four people in 2003, and may be linked to a total of seven deaths, the authorities said.
item.author: By CHRISTOPHER MELE

item.title: Undocumented Migrants, Free Now to Visit Mexico, Face Iffy Future
item.description: Thousands of undocumented immigrants have used travel permission under a 2012 program to visit the countries they left as children. The program could be canceled.
item.author: By KIRK SEMPLE

item.title: Naturalization: Becoming an American
item.description: Carmen Joan Edwards spent 15 years trying to change her status from illegal immigrant to naturalized citizen. She is now eligible to vote on Election Day.
item.author: By NEETI UPADHYE

item.title: Scenes From the Trump Rally in Reno
item.description: Donald J. Trump was abruptly rushed offstage by security on Saturday night at the Reno-Sparks Convention Center.

item.title: On the Trail: Saturday, Nov. 5
item.description: Donald J. Trump and Hillary Clinton held rallies in North Carolina and Florida.

item.title: Trump-Clinton? Charter Schools Are the Big Issue on Massachusetts’ Ballot
item.description: Question 2, if approved, would allow the state to expand charter schools. A pitched battle over the measure reflects the passions that the debate has aroused nationwide.
item.author: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and JESS BIDGOOD

item.title: Donald Trump Rushed Offstage by Secret Service Agents
item.description: A man thought to have a gun was apprehended on Saturday night at a Trump rally in Reno, Nev., but no weapon was found, the Secret Service said, and the man was released.
item.author: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL BARBARO
